imdb.plot outline: A new program stylized for multiple market(s), Marine Media World is geared to expose the yachting/boating lifestyle to television audiences worldwide, while bringing news, event and boat racing coverage to the screen from locations rarely covered. With an eye toward edgy content, a modern shooting style, and some of the world's most beautiful and interesting locations, Marine Media World is a unique, first-of-its-kind program that offers both existing yacht owners and dreamers alike an up-close and personal look at some of the world's most beautiful and exotic yachting destinations.
imdb.title: Marine Media World
plot: Boat races, marina locations, excellent diving spots and more throughout the Caribbean and beyond.::Anonymous

A new program stylized for multiple market(s), _Marine Media World_ (qv) is geared to expose the yachting/boating lifestyle to television audiences worldwide, while bringing news, event and boat racing coverage to the screen from locations rarely covered. With an eye toward edgy content, a modern shooting style, and some of the world's most beautiful and interesting locations, _Marine Media World_ (qv) is a unique, first-of-its-kind program that offers both existing yacht owners and dreamers alike an up-close and personal look at some of the world's most beautiful and exotic yachting destinations.::Producer
